name: Harley-Davidson Motorcycles: Race to the Rally
synopsis: Experience the lifestyle, adventure and freedom of Harley-Davidson like never before in Harley-Davidson: Race to the Rally. You'll ride classic and late-model HD bikes, fully upgrade your bike and face outrageous road challenges. You will have to prove that you are worthy to be part of the Harley-Davidson brotherhood. Race across America from coast to coast exploring classic rides from Big Sur to the Florida Keys. It's time to grab the controller by the handlebars and roll.
